languages.text: [Наполнить голос обещанием неумолимой кары] "Кто из вас, пиратское отребье, осмелится поднять руку на дисциплинарного офицера и на своей шкуре узнать, какую смерть я вам уготовил{mf||а}?"

[Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"
languages.original_text: [Наполнить голос обещанием неумолимой кары] "Кто из вас, пиратское отребье, осмелится поднять руку на дисциплинарного офицера и на своей шкуре узнать, какую смерть я вам уготовил{mf||а}?"

languages.text: [In deiner Stimme das Versprechen unerbittlicher Bestrafung anklingen lassen] "Wer von Euch Piratenabschaum wagt es, seine Hand gegen einen Disziplinaroffizier zu erheben und aus erster Hand zu erfahren, welchen Tod ich für Euch vorbereitet habe?"
languages.original_text: [Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"

traits.locale_text: [In deiner Stimme das Versprechen unerbittlicher Bestrafung anklingen lassen] "Wer von Euch Piratenabschaum wagt es, seine Hand gegen einen Disziplinaroffizier zu erheben und aus erster Hand zu erfahren, welchen Tod ich für Euch vorbereitet habe?"

languages.text: [Adopter un ton proprement menaçant] « Lequel d'entre vous, misérables pirates, a osé lever la main contre un officier responsable de la discipline ? Je vais lui montrer le sort que je lui réserve. »
languages.original_text: [Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Adopter un ton proprement menaçant] « Lequel d'entre vous, misérables pirates, a osé lever la main contre un officier responsable de la discipline ? Je vais lui montrer le sort que je lui réserve. »

languages.text: [高声开口，声音充满无情惩罚的意味]“都给我听好，你们这群海盗渣滓！你们之中有谁敢对惩戒军官动手？有谁想亲自尝尝我给你们准备的死法？”
languages.original_text: [Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"

traits.locale_text: [高声开口，声音充满无情惩罚的意味]“都给我听好，你们这群海盗渣滓！你们之中有谁敢对惩戒军官动手？有谁想亲自尝尝我给你们准备的死法？”

languages.text: [Cargar la voz con la promesa de un castigo inexorable] «¿Quién de vosotros, escoria pirata, se atreverá a levantar la mano contra un{mf||a} oficial disciplinari{mf|o|a} y descubrir de primera mano la muerte que os tengo preparada?».
languages.original_text: [Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Cargar la voz con la promesa de un castigo inexorable] «¿Quién de vosotros, escoria pirata, se atreverá a levantar la mano contra un{mf||a} oficial disciplinari{mf|o|a} y descubrir de primera mano la muerte que os tengo preparada?».

languages.text: [声に容赦ない処罰の約束を込める]「海賊のクズどもの中で、誰が懲戒官に手を上げる勇気があり、{mf|俺|私}が君たちのために用意した死がどのようなものか身をもって思い知らせてやる」
languages.original_text: [Fill your voice with the promise of inexorable punishment] "Who among you pirate scum will dare raise their hand against a disciplinary officer and learn first-hand what kind of death I have prepared for you?"

traits.locale_text: [声に容赦ない処罰の約束を込める]「海賊のクズどもの中で、誰が懲戒官に手を上げる勇気があり、{mf|俺|私}が君たちのために用意した死がどのようなものか身をもって思い知らせてやる」

languages.text: [Amansız bir cezanın gelişini haber veren bir sesle haykır] "Hanginiz bir disiplin subayına el kaldırıp sizlere hazırladığım ölümü ilk elden deneyimlemeye cesaret edecek bakalım sizi aşağılık korsan pislikleri?"
